definition: outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: Novel target biotherapy for lung ca ncer is prospected.
sentences.chinese: 并对新的生物靶向治疗作了展望。

sentences.english: Finally, we give the prospect of VDSL.
sentences.chinese: 最后，展望了VDSL的发展前景。

sentences.english: The end of the year is the best time to review and look ahead.
sentences.chinese: 年关是一个回顾和展望的好时机。

sentences.english: This paper also viewed the future of the application of orchid industries.
sentences.chinese: 并对生物技术在兰花产业中的应用前景进行了展望。

sentences.english: Finally, prospects of future development of seepage detection technology are presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对渗漏检测技术的发展前景作了展望。

sentences.english: Seed: Looking forward, what other text-based visualizations are you planning to develop?
sentences.chinese: 展望未来，还有什么其他的文本图像化技术准备开发？

sentences.english: At the same time a new supercavitating torpedo power system is described.
sentences.chinese: 同时展望了新型的超空泡鱼雷动力系统。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper presents a long-term vista over the application of indoor wireless sensor networks.
sentences.chinese: 最后展望了室内无线传感器网络技术的应用前景。

sentences.english: Chapter 4: summarizes the whole dissertation and gives some expectation for future research.
sentences.chinese: 第四章总结全文并对未来进行了一些展望。

sentences.english: They can be assisted to forget the unpleasant past and to seek for a better future.
sentences.chinese: 服务人员可协助失恋者忘记过去，展望未来。

sentences.english: The method of chitosan chemical modification were reviewed and its development were prospected in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章综述了壳聚糖的化学改性方法并展望其发展前景。

sentences.english: Then do a short sum-up and prospect to this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对本论文的后续研究作了相应的总结和展望。

sentences.english: By doing so you will open a whole new vista for your life.
sentences.chinese: 这可一使你对生活有一个全新的展望。

sentences.english: The development of microscale laser shock processing was presented.
sentences.chinese: 展望了微尺度激光冲击处理技术的发展及应用前景。

sentences.english: Application of Fractal Geometry in Pedology and its Prosptects.
sentences.chinese: 分形几何在土壤学中的应用及其展望。

sentences.english: Section V, inheriting, development and prospect of Inner Mongolia-Han melody.
sentences.chinese: 蒙汉调的传承发展与展望。

definition: turning point/breaking point/inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
to regard as having good prospects
